10/02/02
Forum Probs?
By Kamdar
Today I could barely connect to the forum and I could not log in. Now I can't call the page up at all!
I assume that the rest of you have been experiencing problems as well. Hopefully this situation will clear up soon.
Please pay close attention to this NEWS section and our Calendar to keep up on things, as these pages will be our second line of defense. If you would like to get a message out, please email me and I will post it here. Turnaround time should be less than 12 hours.

Thanks for your patience and understanding.

kamdar@exodusfellowship.com
10/03/02
Forum Update
By Kamdar
Well ity took EZBoard awhile to figure out that they have a problem, but they weem to be on it. Although they didn't make their first prediction of Midnight pacific time last night. We will see if they make their present goal of 8 am PDT this morning. Thanks again for you patience.
10/06/02
On the Brink of WAR!
By Kamdar
Please keep a close eye on the message boards. It seems a war is brewing with our old allies Circle of Shields.
Things may escalate as soon as this weekend, unless something can be done to put a stop to this. Rumor has it that there may be some kind of confrontation in the East Commons. For those of you not prepared to fight, please stay out of harms way, and do what you can to keep your children safe. May the Gods watch over us in these difficult days that lie ahead....
10/18/02
Kamdar Steps Down! Ashmael Promoted to HC!
By Kamdar
For the past several months, it has been my pleasure to once again serve with the guild leaders, but due to rather heavy constraints on my time, I have decided it is best for the Fellowship and myself that I step down from my duties in the High Council. I will still be visiting Norrath and Luclin as often as I can... and I will continue the upkeep of the website. If you folks want to keep this NEWS section alive, I will need your help! Just email me stories, articles or major announcements you think would go well here and I will do what I can to get them up asap. Turnaround should be less than 24 hours.

Now for the GREAT NEWS! Ashmael Soultaker has been voted into the High Council as my replacement. Ash has been with us a long time and has always acted nobly and with great honor. Ash has served us well as a member of the Honor Guard and I am sure will continue to do so as he takes his seat in the High Council Chambers. Please congratulate him when you get the chance!
10/29/02
Chastisy Promoted to Honor Guard!
By Ursi
Congratulations Chastisy Rose on your promotion to honor guard. The announcement was made by Cobo after a very successful mini raid for guild iron oxide in the Hole.
We appreciate all that you have done, Chastisy, through your efforts to port guildies, group with them, and uphold good conduct within our guild.
